ESRI.Configuration.Name: tbl2shp
ESRI.Configuration.Description: Create geometry shapes from given XY Coordinates in a DBF
ESRI.Configuration.Author: Vong Vithyea Srey

Button.caption: 2Pnt
Button.message: Create Point shapefile from given XY Coordinates in a DBF. The DBF must contain XCoord and YCoord fields.
Button.Help: Specify a DBF file on the first dialog windows and specify a shapefile which will store the results in the second dialog window. DBF must contain XCoord and YCoord fields.

Button.caption: 2Line
Button.message: Create Polyline shapefile from given XY Coordinates in a DBF. The DBF must contain XCoord and YCoord fields. Each line seperated by (X,Y) = (0,0).
Button.Help: Specify a DBF file on the first dialog and specify a shapefile which will store the results in the second dialog. DBF must contain XCoord and YCoord fields. Each line seperated by (X,Y) = (0,0).

Button.caption: 2Plgone
Button.message: Create Polygone shapefile from given XY Coordinates in a DBF. The DBF must contain XCoord and YCoord fields. Each Polygone seperated by (X,Y) = (0,0).
Button.Help: Specify a DBF file on the first dialog and specify a shapefile which will store the results in the second dialog. DBF must contain XCoord and YCoord fields. Each Polygone seperated by (X,Y) = (0,0).
